column2: eta at 532. If depol calibration failed because of cloud contamination and there was no available eta within 1 week, the default value will be taken for depol caculations
eta at 355. If depol calibration failed because of cloud contamination and there was no available eta within 1 week, the default value will be taken for depol caculations

lidar constant. If lidar calibration failed and there was no available lidar constants within 1 week, the default values will be taken for calibrate the lidar signal. The order of this variable is the same like the order of the channels

overlap file for saving the overlap function of 532 channel. This file can only have two columns: one is the height [m] and the other is the overlap function. There should be 1 header to describe the variables. An exemplified one can be found in the folder of '/lib/pollyDefaults/'

overlap file for saving the overlap function of 355 channel. This file can only have two columns: one is the height [m] and the other is the overlap function. There should be 1 header to describe the variables. An exemplified one can be found in the folder of '/lib/pollyDefaults/'

molecule depolarization ratio at 532 nm. In theory, this value can be calculated based on the filter bandwidth and central wavelength. But due to some system effects from retardation, diattenuation and depolarization, the theoritical value always deviate with the measured molecular background volume depolarization ratio. And this will introduce large error for calculating the particle depolarization ratio of weak aerosol layers. Therefore, we setup this default to cancel out some part of the influences
std of molecule depolarization ratio at 532 nm.

molecule depolarization ratio at 355 nm. In theory, this value can be calculated based on the filter bandwidth and central wavelength. But due to some system effects from retardation, diattenuation and depolarization, the theoritical value always deviate with the measured molecular background volume depolarization ratio. And this will introduce large error for calculating the particle depolarization ratio of weak aerosol layers. Therefore, we setup this default to cancel out some part of the influences
std of molecule depolarization ratio at 355 nm.

water vapor calibration constant [g*kg^{-1}]. If the water vapor calibration cannot be done and there was no available calibration constant within 1 week, the default water vapor constant will be used.
std of water vapor calibration constant [g*kg^{-1}].
